solution_line_template: He has given out {tickets_given_first_period} tickets because {days_first_period} x {avg_tickets_first_period} = <<{days_first_period}*{avg_tickets_first_period}={tickets_given_first_period}>>{tickets_given_first_period}
He has {remaining_days} days left to had out tickets because {total_days_in_may} - {days_first_period} = <<{total_days_in_may}-{days_first_period}={remaining_days}>>{remaining_days}

He has to give out {tickets_remaining_to_give} more because {total_tickets_goal} - {tickets_given_first_period} = <<{total_tickets_goal}-{tickets_given_first_period}={tickets_remaining_to_give}>>{tickets_remaining_to_give}

He has to give out {avg_tickets_per_day_remaining} a day because {tickets_remaining_to_give} / {remaining_days} = <<{tickets_remaining_to_give}/{remaining_days}={avg_tickets_per_day_remaining}>>{avg_tickets_per_day_remaining}
